TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You get a box with all Star Trek seasons and you're free to do what you want with it.

I wish for a door.

Granted. It slams into your face

I wish everyone used metric system, so this and this never happened

Granted, but now the metric system is the same as the imperial system, and vice versa.

I wish that I had a flying castle, a Castle in the Sky. (This is probably the most obscure reference ever. Hint: its related to a anime movie)

Granted, but it's in interstellar space.

Obscure, but not obscure enough to evade me.

I wish for a fish.

Edited April 27, 2013 by Felsmak

Granted. Say hello to Jaws. (Exact copy of a previous wish corruption.)

I wish that I owned a Buran that was in perfect working order, was on Earth, could fly into space and that no one stole, broke or otherwise tampered with it. Also, I want it to be unbreakable.

Granted, but it's at the south pole.

I wish for a pretty watch.

Edited April 27, 2013 by Felsmak

Granted, but it's at the south pole.

I wish for a pretty watch.

How is the Buran being at the south pole a corruption? I can just bring it over to where I live!

Anyway, you now have a PICTURE of a pretty watch.

I wish a was the President of the United States!!!

Granted

I wish I was god-empress of Earth!

How is the Buran being at the south pole a corruption? I can just bring it over to where I live!

Your wish left little room for corruption, but if you want to I could place it on the "real" ground beneath the ice so that you can dig it out!

... Unless that counts as not being in working condition.

Granted, but your new form is that of a mole. Just to make your new subjects feel more comfortable with your rule.

I wish for a ladel.

Edited April 27, 2013 by Felsmak

Granted, but everyone already left.

I wish to be the leader of the first off-world nation.

Granted but your army leads a coup against you.

I wish that fuel wasn't a problem anywere.

Granted, fuel is completely safe now, but it is also incredibly scarce now, with the world destroying itself to try and get their hands on the last liter.

I wish that I had a ticket for a ride on SpaceShipTwo.

Granted, fuel is completely safe now, but it is also incredibly scarce now, with the world destroying itself to try and get their hands on the last liter.

I wish that I had a ticket for a ride on SpaceShipTwo.

Granted, but it turns out that you have less time in zero-gee than if you had just ridden the vomit comet.

I wish that my work payed me in bitcoins.

Granted, but they are paid to someone else by the same name as you.

I wish for a good black pen.

Granted, and its so good that you become a hermit and live in a remote swamp to prevent anyone from seeing your PRECIOUS pen.

I wish that I knew what the best game ever of all time was.

Granted. Portal 2.

I wish for unobtainum.

Granted, but it seems to be affected by how much you epik phailed at corrupting my previous wish, making it completely and utterly UNOBTAINABLE.

I wish that I had a miniature Kerbol System.

Granted,miniature means kerbol is as big as the earth.

I wish for no wish.

Granted, but you still made that wish anyway.

I iwhsh fpor m,oer tyyping skiolzz

Granted, the only word you can speak is fail.

Granted, but it seems to be affected by how much you epik phailed at corrupting my previous wish, making it completely and utterly UNOBTAINABLE.

No! It wasn't supposed to be corrupted! Portal 2 is the best game ever, and you do NOT corrupt your most favorite game, ever!

I wish (An Original Name) had more common sense.

Granted, but now my common sense tells me to be a sooper l33t assassin and assassinate you.

I wish that ROFLCopter64bit was 8 bit instead.

Granted,

I wish that I knew how to Mod for KSP.

Granted, you are now a forum mod.

I wish for (An Orignal Name) to be called (An Unoriginal Name)

Granted, But everyone thinks your not creative cause you can't think of "an Original name"

I wish for KSP space planes to be easier to make
